subject: RE: [junit] Eclipse JUnit bug?
msgSnippet: ... The exact stacktrace would help, too... Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> Rod Gonzaga wrote:
>>
>> Anyone have the following bizarre problem in Eclipse w/Junit?
>>
>> Have some test cases, all with the proper public constructors that
>> take one string as a parameter. When I try to run them using the
>> JUnit plug-in, I get the AssertionFailedError 'cuz it can't find the
>> the constructors.
>>
>> When I manually invoke java.textui.TestRunner on the tests, they
>> work fine.
>>
>> I'm in Eclipse 3.0.1 JUnit 3.8.1
>
> Please show us the source for one of those TestCase classes. Thanks.

The exact stacktrace would help, too...

Cheers, Ilja
